term.name: epilog
term.def: The end of the generated file, after the template.

term.name: locator
term.def: An element in a Dynamator annotations file that identifies the set of elements to which a set of overrides will apply.

term.name: marker
term.def: An invisible HTML element or attribute that identifies a location in an HTML file. The HTML 4.0 markers are div, span, id, and class.

term.name: override
term.def: An element in a Dynamator annotations file that specifies a set of changes to be applied to the template. (AKA "modifier")

term.name: prolog
term.def: The beginning of the generated file, before the template.

term.name: template
term.def: The file containing the static text pattern to be output by the generated program.
